ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix

cookingTips: Wild game benefits from braising—the apple juice adds brightness to gamey flavors
Brown the roast in oil before slow cooking for better color and flavor
Check internal temperature—wild game is leaner and can dry out if overcooked
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Moose is a lean, flavorful game meat. Would you like to add vegetables like carrots and onions, or keep this minimal? Should we reduce the cooking liquid afterward for a pan sauce?
